header.title: About Me
body: I have a strong passion for developing and creating web sites and applications. I have strived to keep up with technology, industry trends and design practises as the internet and web development has evolved. I take pride in creating standards compliant code that works on any modern browser, and in using dynamic and exciting techniques to make the user experience easy and enjoyable.

As well as excelling in web development, I have experience with many other areas of IT, including programming in languages such as C, C++, Java and Python, software development, game development, database design and programming, networking, operating systems, and computer hardware.

header.title: Objective
body: To use my experience and skills in web development to contribute towards something worthwhile, and to further develop my web development skills, keeping up with web technologies as they continue to evolve.
